Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Is Your Business Protected?You put a lot of hard work into your business. Let Infinity help you protect it. Do you need an expert to point out your options for maximum protection? Infinity keeps you on the job with great rates and the right coverage for your business. Find out how easy it is to save money on your commercial vehicle and other insurance needs.

Founded in 1991, Truitt Insurance & Bonding Inc. is a provider of commercial, life and home insurance products. Based in Birmingham, Ala., the company serves the insurance and bonding needs of a variety of businesses and individuals throughout Alabama and the surrounding states. It offers a wide range of commercial property and casualty insurance products, including business automobile coverage, commercial property insurance, crime insurance, errors and omissions, fiduciary liability, commercial umbrella, general liability, boiler and machinery, employment practices liability, inland marine coverage, and kidnap /ransom insurance among others. The firm provides various types of bonds, such as bid, performance and payment bonds, license and permit bonds, and notary, court, fiduciary and public official bonds.

Protective Life Insurance Company is an operating subsidiary of Protective Life Corporation. The company provides insurance and investment products to individuals and families throughout the United States. It is affiliated with West Coast Life Insurance Company, Empire General Life Assurance Corporation and Protective Life and Annuity Insurance Company. Protective Life s acquisitions division acquires blocks of policies from other businesses. The company features retirement plans and investment products, such as annuities, funding agreements and guaranteed investment contracts. It also supplies asset-protection instruments, including credit insurance and service contracts. John D. Johns has been the chief executive officer of Protective Life for more than four years. He has been with the insurance company for over 13 years. Johns earned a BA from the University of Alabama, and a MBA from Harvard. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1961, United Investors Life Insurance Company sells a variety of life insurance and annuity products, including variable universal life, variable annuities, term life, interest-sensitive whole life and fixed annuities. It is a subsidiary of the Torchmark Corporation, which provides life and health insurance products and annuities to middle income households throughout the United States. The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Is Your Business Protected?You put a lot of hard work into your business. Let Infinity help you protect it. Do you need an expert to point out your options for maximum protection? Protective Life Insurance Company is an operating subsidiary of Protective Life Corporation. The company provides insurance and investment products to individuals and families throughout the United States. It is affiliated with West Coast Life Insurance Company, Empire General Life Assurance Corporation and Protective Life and Annuity Insurance Company. Protective Life s acquisitions division acquires blocks of policies from other businesses. The company features retirement plans and investment products, such as annuities, funding agreements and guaranteed investment contracts. It also supplies asset-protection instruments, including credit insurance and service contracts. John D. Johns has been the chief executive officer of Protective Life for more than four years. He has been with the insurance company for over 13 years. Johns earned a BA from the University of Alabama, and a MBA from Harvard. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1961, United Investors Life Insurance Company sells a variety of life insurance and annuity products, including variable universal life, variable annuities, term life, interest-sensitive whole life and fixed annuities. It is a subsidiary of the Torchmark Corporation, which provides life and health insurance products and annuities to middle income households throughout the United States. The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. Protective Life Insurance Company is an operating subsidiary of Protective Life Corporation. The company provides insurance and investment products to individuals and families throughout the United States. It is affiliated with West Coast Life Insurance Company, Empire General Life Assurance Corporation and Protective Life and Annuity Insurance Company. Protective Life s acquisitions division acquires blocks of policies from other businesses. The company features retirement plans and investment products, such as annuities, funding agreements and guaranteed investment contracts. It also supplies asset-protection instruments, including credit insurance and service contracts. John D. Johns has been the chief executive officer of Protective Life for more than four years. He has been with the insurance company for over 13 years. Johns earned a BA from the University of Alabama, and a MBA from Harvard. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1961, United Investors Life Insurance Company sells a variety of life insurance and annuity products, including variable universal life, variable annuities, term life, interest-sensitive whole life and fixed annuities. It is a subsidiary of the Torchmark Corporation, which provides life and health insurance products and annuities to middle income households throughout the United States. The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Protective Life Insurance Company is an operating subsidiary of Protective Life Corporation. The company provides insurance and investment products to individuals and families throughout the United States. It is affiliated with West Coast Life Insurance Company, Empire General Life Assurance Corporation and Protective Life and Annuity Insurance Company. Protective Life s acquisitions division acquires blocks of policies from other businesses. The company features retirement plans and investment products, such as annuities, funding agreements and guaranteed investment contracts. It also supplies asset-protection instruments, including credit insurance and service contracts. John D. Johns has been the chief executive officer of Protective Life for more than four years. He has been with the insurance company for over 13 years. Johns earned a BA from the University of Alabama, and a MBA from Harvard. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1961, United Investors Life Insurance Company sells a variety of life insurance and annuity products, including variable universal life, variable annuities, term life, interest-sensitive whole life and fixed annuities. It is a subsidiary of the Torchmark Corporation, which provides life and health insurance products and annuities to middle income households throughout the United States. The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Protective Life Insurance Company is an operating subsidiary of Protective Life Corporation. The company provides insurance and investment products to individuals and families throughout the United States. It is affiliated with West Coast Life Insurance Company, Empire General Life Assurance Corporation and Protective Life and Annuity Insurance Company. Protective Life s acquisitions division acquires blocks of policies from other businesses. The company features retirement plans and investment products, such as annuities, funding agreements and guaranteed investment contracts. It also supplies asset-protection instruments, including credit insurance and service contracts. John D. Johns has been the chief executive officer of Protective Life for more than four years. He has been with the insurance company for over 13 years. Johns earned a BA from the University of Alabama, and a MBA from Harvard. Protective Life Insurance Company was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Birmingham, Ala.

Founded in 1961, United Investors Life Insurance Company sells a variety of life insurance and annuity products, including variable universal life, variable annuities, term life, interest-sensitive whole life and fixed annuities. It is a subsidiary of the Torchmark Corporation, which provides life and health insurance products and annuities to middle income households throughout the United States. The company also provides supplemental plans that include hospital, surgical, cancer and accidental plans for individuals under the age of 65; and Medicare Part D prescription drug insurance. United Investors Life Insurance Company markets its products through more than 4,000 representatives. It is located in Birmingham, Ala.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.

Infinity Insurance Company provides products to individuals with a proven record of accident-free driving, to those who have difficulty obtaining coverage because of a record of accidents or violations, or because of clients  age, occupation or type of car. Infinity writes automobile insurance in 34 states, with expanded authority to 9 other states. The Infinity Group was purchased in 1991 by the Pennsylvania Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of American Premier Underwriters. In 1995, American Premier Underwriters merged with American Financial Corporation to form the American Financial Group. Infinity became part of Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation in 2002. Infinity Property & Casualty Corporation ranks among the largest writers of non-standard automobile insurance through independent insurance agents. Prior to 1992, The Infinity Group was known as The Dixie Insurance Companies that was founded 1955. The company employs more than 2,300 people, strategically located across the nation, with administrative offices in Birmingham, Ala. It s other field offices handle marketing functions, agency relations and professional claims-adjusting.
